sentence: The  heavy  bombardment  and  ground  operations  across  Gaza  killed  nearly  200  Palestinians  and  wounded  hundreds  more  in  the  first  day  of  resumed  fighting,  according  to  the  Health  Ministry  in  Hamas-controlled  Gaza.
The  attacks  killed  1,200  people,  Israel  says.
